name: John Doe
message: Hey, have you seen the latest episode of that show we've been watching?

name: Samantha Wilson
message: Hey Sam, do you have any recommendations for a good hiking trail nearby?

name: Michael Thompson
message: Hey Michael, I wanted to follow up on that project proposal we discussed last week.

name: Emily Davis
message: Hey Emily, are you still planning on going to that concert next month?

name: David Brown
message: Hey David, I wanted to check in about our upcoming project deadline.

name: Sarah Thompson
message: Hey Sarah, I wanted to run something by you.
